control_attributes.control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to employ dynamic code analysis tools to identify common flaws and document the results of the analysis.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization uses all-source intelligence analysis of suppliers and potential suppliers of the information system, system component, or information system service.

Control Statement: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to employ dynamic code analysis tools to identify common flaws and document the results of the analysis.
